item.title: Guide to building command line tools
item.author: Unknown
item.description: In this article i want to start building a simple command line tool with best practices in golang and some other tools. As you know today many famous tools like docker, kubernetes and many other written in golang and all of them have have a powerful and standard command line interface for interact with its core. This indicate that golang is a good choice for building command line tools in large scale.

item.title: Docker for developers
item.author: Unknown
item.description: The first step to start learning docker is to distinguish two word, image and container. By knowing them you can go deeper and learn some useful command to work with docker in your projects for development and also use it for easy deployment. Docker also has some advance concepts like Docker Swarm that it is an orchestration tool. You will also learn some basic knowledge about it in this post.
